title: Q2 - Can a person request all their data be “ported” (moved) to another company like GDPR allows?
description: No — the Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023 (DPDPA) does not include a right to data portability, unlike the European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
